Comment: The American dream is the ability to get an education, get a good job, and retire comfortably when you're ready. The ability to own a home and have a family if one chooses to without it ruining their financial security. All in a nation that respects the personal choices of its diverse population where no one group can tell someone how to live their life.   Most people don't want much but to be comfortable and secure, while being free to live the life they want to live.

Comment: My vision of the American Dream is to go back to the FDR era tax code. It is only right that we take the burden off of middle class families and small businesses and make big businesses and people that can give a lot, give at least some. The New Deal gave us a prosperous 50s, it is not right that only the boomers and silent generation get the enjoy the benefits of inheriting the wealth of the land.

Comment: Social democracy in a style similar to Western European countries. Get money out of politics. Tax the Rich effectively (even if we could enforce current laws). Housing, food, clean water, clean air, and medical care should be treated as a human right that EVERYONE gets. Promote building nice, affordable rental units like in Europe rather than overpriced, under built, uninsurable McMansions. Improve public transit and train infrastructure. Also, everyone should be treated like HUMANS regardless of race, gender, or wealth.

Author: ChanceG1955

Comment: At least Millennials mostly don't remember a time when they woke up every morning wondering if today is the day the nukes will fly.  Or if that wasn't it, then AIDS.  If not that, then killer bees were gonna get us.  If not that, there was always the quicksand.  Or being told that you were a loser and slacker while simultaneously being ignored by the group of people who are your parents, and having to witness that generation below you getting high praise and 'everyone is a winner' from this same group of people.  And a couple more recessions.  Every generation experiences its own piles of shit.  Doesn't make one generation better or worse than another.   We are all humans moving through life together.  The best we can do is to not fuck it up any more and make it worse for the rest.
Author: crucial_geek
